description: Sounds like a fun game.. too bad it wouldn't open on Ubuntu 19.10.

This is so weird, from kde discover this is named Memorize, and cant be launched, i find the name is: sugar-activity ?? and need adittional data to even be launched, like something they called "activity".
The short description just dont match with the long description.
And theres is no man page.
Just really weird
Bei mir startet das Programm nach der Installation nicht.
